Html:
Hi,

I have a little weird question.

I am using a Bluetooth A2DP speaker that eat some 2-3 seconds audio before playing.

I tried to add OffsetSampleProvider to delay the audio but it do not work (I assume it is too smart and skip blank)
http://mark-dot-net.blogspot.co.uk/2012/09/naudio-offsetsampleprovider.html

Is there a trick to send dummy audio to start the speaker before sending the real audio ?
Cool it works bug was on my side ! I also test with white noise using SignalGenerator
great, glad it's working for you now
